entities.name: trunks
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is rocking back and forward on her trunk in paroxysms of grief.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The Minister of Magic countersigned the order for Professor Trelawney's dismissal.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is being dismissed from Hogwarts and is reacting with grief.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is trying to calm down Professor Trelawney and telling her she won't have to leave Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is questioning Professor McGonagall's statement that Professor Trelawney won't have to leave Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is trying to calm down Professor Trelawney.
